# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Subset_plot)

ADD_PLOT_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Subset)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
SubsetPluginInfo.C
SubsetCommonPluginInfo.C
SubsetAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
SubsetPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
SubsetGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisSubsetPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisSubsetPlotWindow.h
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
SubsetViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
SubsetViewerPluginInfo.C
avtSubsetPlot.C
avtSubsetFilter.C
avtSubsetMapper.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
SubsetViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
SubsetEnginePluginInfo.C
avtSubsetPlot.C
avtSubsetFilter.C
avtSubsetMapper.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_PLOT_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter/vtk
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ISubsetPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ISubsetPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ISubsetPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    QT_WRAP_CPP(GSubsetPlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})
    ADD_LIBRARY(GSubsetPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GSubsetPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VSubsetPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(VSubsetPlot VIEWER)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VSubsetPlot visitcommon viewer )

    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GSubsetPlot VSubsetPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            SubsetScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PySubsetAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SSubsetPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        IF(WIN32)
            # This prevents python from #defining snprintf as _snprintf
            SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(SSubsetPlot PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS HAVE_SNPRINTF)
        ENDIF()
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SSubsetPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SSubsetPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY SubsetAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/plots)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaSubset ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} SubsetAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ESubsetPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESubsetPlot_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtplotter_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESubsetPlot_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESubsetPlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ESubsetPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESubsetPlot_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtplotter_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESubsetPlot_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESubsetPlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(plots ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(plots Subset ${INSTALLTARGETS})
